tagline: 'Read the best books first or you may not have a chance to read them at all.' --Henry David Thoreau
description: Helios is an open API of ideas. Inspired by Mortimer J. Adler's Syntopicon, Helios is a catalogued index of 102 fundamental 'great ideas' around which competing schools of thought have developed over the past 28 centuries. With over 500,000 references to the works of eminent thinkers from Homer to Shakespeare, Euclid to Einstein, Aristotle to Descartes, Helios aims to be a source reference for people earnestly seek a more liberal education.
